content.description: Start in hole on the boulder's west side. NOTE: A bit contrived to not just sit on rock behind you but possible nonetheless.    Bear hug the boulder with one hand on each arete, right foot down further in hole on good bump, left foot on rail left side of boulder. Bump hands up aretes and go for top (avoiding boulder behind you). Pull over lip of bulge to top.
content.protection: Pad not really needed but a spot maybe useful
content.location: Find down climb for red beauty boulder into chimney. This problem is on the other boulder, which comprises the south half of the chimney.

content.description: Start sitting near right arete, hands matched on ledge. Bump right hand up to arete, find your feet, then make a long move up to the lip and topout. Not really that fun, but it is there.
content.location: Northwest corner of Red Beauty Boulder

content.description: This climbs the large spike running down the center of the boulder. Start real low on sidepulls, then slap your way up the spike to the lip. Great moves, this would be ultra-classic if it was about 10 feet taller.

This is one of the northern most boulders in the Mystic area, up on the talus slope. This boulder has unusual reddish color and texture to some parts of it. The problems are on the north face, with an easy chimney downclimb between this boulder and another one. Short problems, one of which is pretty fun.
